sentence.Network_en: Professors around the world have heralded his work as groundbreaking.

list.abs: this is a groundbreaking endeavor that is focused on emotional well-being and happiness and designed to help people foster stronger social relationships .这是对探索情感健康和幸福快乐的一个突破性的努力，旨在帮助人们树立更稳固的社会关系。

any package development team intent on groundbreaking design should allow at least 18 months to properly develop an innovative package , test it , and get ample volume into distribution .任何包装的开发团队打算突破性设计应允许至少18个月，以制定正确的创新封装，测试，并获得充分的生产量将分配。

entry.tran: 开创性的；创新的；革新的
entry.def: You use groundbreaking to describe things which you think are significant because they provide new and positive ideas, and influence the way people think about things.

example.tran: 他关于同性恋题材的开创性小说

means.word_mean: 1. the ceremonial breaking of the ground to formally begin a construction project
1. being or producing something like nothing done or experienced or created before;

Sentence.sentence: Over the next two years they made their most groundbreaking work, turning the recording studio into a magical instrument of its own.
